long_description: Got a desert hike or long kayak trip planned? Be sure to wear the Sunday Afternoons Sojourner Hat with its wide brim and excellent sun protection rating. Polyester hat with 3.5 in. brim and UPF 50+ keeps harmful UV rays off your face and neck. Contoured tri-panel crown design has strategically placed mesh ventilation. Chinstrap keeps hat on during a stiff breeze; floatable brim is ideal for boating. Sunday Afternoons Sojourner Hat has a wicking sweatband for comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Got a desert hike or long kayak trip planned? Be sure to wear the Sunday Afternoons Sojourner Hat with its wide brim and excellent sun protection rating.
